__e: Not much for me there, except my father.
And the person who could help us the most refuses to talk to anyone. Except his mother.
His past? Jack, every person in this room, with the exception of him, is here for your daughter.
Can anyone tell me what the exception to the rule of... Brothers and sisters, it is time to open your eyes.
Except for the part where you said, "I believe what I want to believe".
You're doing a great job, except for the other side.
Well... I figured you'd make an exception for-for good news.
Well, if we're making exceptions for a job well-done... how about a kiss, like in the movies?
I haven't spoken for years. Aside from my new accomplice. Such a long time....
With the minor exception that I'm going to walk out of here alive.
It'd be like any night, except I'd close the place to the public for you and your dearest.
With the possible exception of Daniel, who, let's face it, was always a little bit...
Except for the fact that he shot at us in the first place.
At some point, I want the house and the kids and all that stuff that you say, but right now? I don't know what I want except I know it's got something to do with music.
And normally that would be fine... except that I've got no one else to talk to.
